info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2022,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
I found this beautiful airbnb at a reasonable price when there was super rush with super extra money for hotels in Cox’s- Bazar.
I had the best experience, the host was amazing & very helpful- he was trying to make sure our comfortableness in everyway.
Also, the place was clean, close to sugandha beach and with a nice view (if you get the belcony room).
I enjoyed my stay and I will highly recommend this to others.
